ratings.en: Atsuki namida, yasashiku kare no kokoro o mitashi...
Mukunaru wagakoyo hikari to nemure
Tada hitasuna naru inori no hate ni
Aishikimono e no tsugunai wa...
Hanbun dake no tamashii ga kanashiki mezame o yobiokosu
Hikari ni ts没zuru tadashiki michi wa
Itami to iu na no yami wa hitahita to...
Sore wa tada hitotsu no tsugunai
Tamashii no iro wa eien ni...
Tsubasa ni kuwareta tamashii wa aishii wagako no yume o miru?
Setsunaru omoi no yuku sue wa
Natsukashiki kioku wa itami to tomo ni
Anohi, Tashika ni kare to ita
Hikari aru michi no saki ni mieru mono wa...
Shinjitsu wa hikari no todokanu yami no soko ni
Tomo ni tatakau riy没... Sen'y没 to yobareru shikaku
Futari de sasageru rekuiemu
Majiwaranu ai, saredo kienu ai no iku sue wa...
Nazeyue ni, nanji, haisha no tobira o kuguru..
Yami no tsubasa no kenzoku wa, fuk么 o matoi, maioriru
Yurusazaru mono yami ni obore... Ai suru mono wa namida ni nureru
Kokoron oyami no sono saki ni
Sutei no hikari ni michibikare, nozokishimono wa...
Ainakimono no seigi wa izuko ni.... Yami ni ubawareshi kokoroyo, eien ni...
Shinjitsu wa ikue ni mo tsuranaru kokoro no kanata ni...
